title: 경연 이야기-JP 저작자
content:
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]

* [[[contest-archive-jp|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/contest-archive-jp コンテストアーカイブ-JP]" by "[[user jet0620]]" //et al.//

-----

* [[[2014-haloween-kikaku-hub-byboatob|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/2014-haloween-kikaku-hub-byboatob 2014ハロウィン企画「記事-JP-HWを書こう」]" by "[[user boatOB]]"

-----

* [[[800-taletale|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/800-taletale 非公式800字tale参加作品]" by "[[user boatOB]]"
 * [[[ukitanomos-tales-mtarou800|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/ukitanomos-tales-mtarou800 日本財団昔話「桃太郎」]" by "[[user ukit]]"
 * [[[takamata-chili-sauce|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/takamata-chili-sauce 宇喜田博士のチリソース煮]" by "[[user takamata]]"
 * [[[yosh0123-5mx5mx5m|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/yosh0123-5mx5mx5m 125m³]" by "[[user yosh0123]]"
 * [[[the-long-name|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/the-long-name 長名]" by "[[user Wanazawawww]]"
 * [[[collected-item-no19316|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/collected-item-no19316 第一九三一六番]" by "[[user Wanazawawww]]"
 * [[[the-note|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/the-note 最高に字が汚いことで有名なとある研究員の部屋で発見された手記の52ぺージ目に書かれていた短い文章]" by "[[user hal_aki]]"
 * [[[hirose-tale02|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/hirose-tale02 回収文書██号]" by "[[user hirose3019]]"
 * [[[mary-tale09|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/mary-tale09 サイト9999にて]" by "[[user mary0228]]"

-----

* [[[1200-taletale-hub|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/1200-taletale-hub 非公式1200字掌編企画参加作品]" by "[[user boatOB]]"
 * [[[micro-heroic-tale|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/micro-heroic-tale 表題：少年の夢と信頼を踏みにじった、エセヒーローどもの茶番劇]" by "[[user home-watch]]"
 * [[[nekoyori|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/nekoyori ねこより]" by "[[user boatOB]]"
 * [[[as-an-agent|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/as-an-agent 財団職員として、世界を、何より──]" by "[[user amamiel]]"
 * [[[dancingkanahebi|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/dancingkanahebi 月刊［編集済］19██年█月号　付録より　『レプティリアンは実在していた！？　ビデオに映る知的爬虫類！』]" by "[[user tokage-otoko]]"

-----

* [[[scpjp-the-third-anniversary|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scpjp-the-third-anniversary 日本支部3周年記念イベント]" by "[[user darumaboy]]"
 * [[[2016-illust-contest|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/2016-illust-contest 3周年記念イラストコンテスト]" by "[[user jet0620]]"
 * [[[scp1000jp-contest-hub|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp1000jp-contest-hub SCP-1000-JPコンテスト]" by "[[user darumaboy]]"

-----

* [[[4thanivpages|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/4thanivpages 4周年記念コンテストハブ]" by "[[user Nanimono Demonai]]"
 * [[[1600con17|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/1600con17 1600文字コンテスト]" by "[[user Nanimono Demonai]]"
  * [[[chicken-or-cake|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/chicken-or-cake EAT IT！]" by "[[user Amateria68]]"
  * [[[shark-of-sappho|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/shark-of-sappho ユカ上手]" by "[[user crow_109]]"
  * [[[the-continue|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/the-continue 命、だけでなく]" by "[[user AiliceHershey]]"

-----

* [[[5thanivpages|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/5thanivpages ５周年コンテスト・ハブ]" by "[[user seafield13]]"
 * [[[warucontest|]]] is based on "[http://ja.scp-wiki.net/warucontest 5年目の悪のコンテスト]" by "[[user Nanimono Demonai]]"

[[/div]]
